message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
Not bad, but I'm thinking I can do better. Your turn is next, though!
Not bad, but I think I can do better too! I'll make a counteroffer.
A fair split, Bob. I think this is a good compromise.
I'm not convinced this is the best deal. I'm willing to take a risk and try to get more.
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob! I'm not accepting this offer.
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to compromise.
I'm not sure why you're not willing to meet me at 5000, but I'll try to do better.
Still a bit too low, Bob. I'm not giving up yet!
Getting closer, Bob. Let's make a deal!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about making a deal. I'll try to make one last push.
You're pushing your luck, Bob. I'm not going to give in now!
Last chance, Bob. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
I'm not falling for the 'last chance' trick. I'll try to get as much as I can in the final rounds.
You're not getting it, Bob. I'm not going to give in now!
This is getting desperate, Bob. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
I'm not falling for the desperation tactic. This is my final offer, and I'm not backing down.
No way, Bob. I'd rather walk away with nothing than accept this insult.
